DOC.detailed_description: This non-randomized , single group ( N=15 ) , repeat measure study . The study take place David M. Crowley Research Rehabilitation Lab School Health Professions University Texas Southwestern Medical Center . The outcome measure study include : 1 . GAITRite System temporal spatial parameter , 2 . EMG anterior tibialis , gastrocnemius , vastus lateralis muscle , 3 . 6 Minute Walk Test ( gait endurance ) 4 . Lower extremity strength , 5 . MS Fatigue scale , 6 . Observational Gait Analysis - Video tape ground walk . This study 13 week long . Over 13 week period , subject participate 5 gait training session week 1 , 2 , 3 , 7 , 10 . They 60 minute duration . Outcome measure assess follow time : initial ( T1 ) , week 5 ( T2 ) , week 13 ( T3 ) . Subjects closely monitor throughout 13 week study un-enrolled self-request follow medical reason : 1 . Acute exacerbation MS symptom , 2 . New diagnosis direct consequence affect gait training , 3 . Inability tolerate study AFO .
